Package edu.wheaton.simulator.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Display
    This class will act as the singular JFrame window for the interface, with different screens being displayed on it by using the setContentPane method to switch to the "current" or "active" screen.
    DisplayManager  
    EditEntityScreen  
    EditFieldScreen  
    EditSimScreen  
    EntityScreen  
    FieldScreen  
    Main  
    NewSimulationScreen  
    Screen
    Each window will have its own subclass of this abstract class, and one instance of each will be created in the SimulatorMenu constructor.
    ScreenManager  
    SimulatorMenu
    This class will act as the singular JFrame window for the interface, with different screens being displayed on it by using the setContentPane method to switch to the "current" or "active" screen.
    SpawningScreen  
    StatisticsScreen  
    TitleScreen  
    ViewSimScreen
